name: Hum Drum Experiences
description: Take on the role of a person hovering between life and death. Journey through a vibrant world while collecting masks, which help you along in your adventure. Moral ambiguity, questionable ethics and fully-fleshed out characters await in this new RPG adventure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 Storage: 5 GB available space
